prompt: Design a compact, Vastu-compliant 2BHK house for a 20x30 feet north-facing plot in a Tier 2 Indian city. Budget is tight, focus on functionality and cost-effectiveness.
scratchpad: User wants a 2BHK on a small 600 sq ft north-facing plot. Vastu is critical. Budget is low. Plan: Ground floor layout. Pooja room in NE corner. Kitchen in SE. Master bed in SW. Second bed in NW or W. Toilet/bath placement should be careful, avoid NE/SW corners. Use standard 9-inch exterior and 4.5-inch interior brick walls. Simple RCC roof. Maximize carpet area by minimizing circulation space. The living area should be right at the entrance in the north. Stairs can be internal, maybe L-shaped to save space. Given the small plot, a combined living/dining area is practical.
